original: 吳郡富春人，東吳宗室。孫權之姪。青龍二年，諸葛亮五次北伐，孫吳亦發兵攻合肥新城以為響應。孫泰於此役中被曹魏將領滿寵射殺。
text: Wu Jun Fuchun, Dongwu clan. Sun Quanzhi's wife. In the second year of Qinglong, Zhuge Liang made five northern expeditions, and Sun Wu also sent troops to the Hefei New City in response. Sun Tai was shot and killed by General Cao Wei in this campaign.
